details: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), PayPal, and Apple Pay. Crypto is not accepted at this time.
Yes, we ship globally. International shipping usually takes 7-14 business days depending on customs.
Complimentary luxury gift wrapping is available for all orders over $50. You can select this option at checkout.
Our chocolates are made in a facility that handles nuts, dairy, and soy. Please check individual product descriptions for specific ingredients.
For urgent issues not solvable by AI, please email support@beyonchocolate.com or call 070 511 0370 (Mon-Fri 9am-5pm).
